original_text: And he spake kindly to him, and set his throne above the throne of the kings that were with him in Babylon;
korean_text: 그에게 좋게 말하고 그의 지위를 바벨론에 그와 함께 있는 모든 왕의 지위보다 높이고

sentences.original_text: And he spake kindly to him
and set his throne above the throne
of the kings that were with him
